# Taux de chômage

Importation des données 
```{r}
id <- "ei_lmhr_m"
chomage <- get_eurostat(id)
chomage_clean <- chomage %>% 
  filter(s_adj == "SA", 
         geo == "PT",
         indic %in% c("LM-UN-T-GT25", # + de 25 ans
                      "LM-UN-T-LE25", # 25 ans et -
                      "LM-UN-T-TOT")) %>% 
  select(indic, TIME_PERIOD, values)
```

Graphique
```{r}
chomage_clean %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = TIME_PERIOD, y = values, colour = indic)) + 
  geom_line(size = 0.5) + 
  labs(
    title = "Évolution du chômage au portugal",
    x = "Année",
    y = "Taux de chômage",
    colour = "Population"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +  
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
  )
```
